attributes.action: raise the income amount the law says you can live on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A the moment thr law states that a family can live on £96.25 per week for food, bills etc.  This is outrageous there is no way that this is correct and it needs to be looked into and changed accordingly.  The low income families are suffering as wages do not reflect the cost of living and neither does income support!
